017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.umlgraph;
019
020import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.CONSTRUCTOR;
021import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.FIELD;
022import static javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind.METHOD;
023import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PROTECTED;
024import static javax.lang.model.element.Modifier.PUBLIC;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.ToolKit.requireNonNullArgument;
027
028import javax.lang.model.element.AnnotationMirror;
029import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
030import javax.lang.model.element.ElementKind;
031import javax.lang.model.element.ElementVisitor;
032import javax.lang.model.element.Modifier;
033import javax.lang.model.element.Name;
034import javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror;
035import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.Set;
038
039import org.apiguardian.api.API;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.javadoc.internal.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
041
042/**
043 *  The wrapper for an
044 *  {@link Element}
045 *  instance, enhanced by information needed for the creation of the UML graph.
046 *
047 *  @author Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @version $Id: UMLElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $
049 *  @since 0.0.5
050 */
051@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: UMLElement.java 976 2022-01-06 11:39:58Z tquadrat $" )
052@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5")
053public abstract class UMLElement implements Element
054{
055        /*------------*\
056    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
057        \*------------*/
058    /**
059     *  The wrapped element.
060     */
061    private final Element m_Wrapped;
062
063        /*--------------*\
064    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
065        \*--------------*/
066    /**
067     *  Creates a new {@code UMLElement} instance.
068     *
069     *  @param  element The wrapped element.
070     */
071    protected UMLElement( final Element element )
072    {
073        m_Wrapped = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" );
074    }   //  UMLElement()
075
076        /*---------*\
077    ====** Methods **==========================================================
078        \*---------*/
079    /**
080     *  {@inheritDoc}
081     */
082    @Override
083    public final <R,P> R accept( final ElementVisitor<R,P> visitor, final P payload )
084    {
085        return m_Wrapped.accept( visitor, payload );
086    }   //  accept()
087
088    /**
089     *  {@inheritDoc}
090     */
091    @Override
092    public final TypeMirror asType() { return m_Wrapped.asType(); }
093
094    /**
095     *  {@inheritDoc}
096     */
097    @Override
098    public final <A extends Annotation> A getAnnotation( final Class<A> annotationType )
099    {
100        return m_Wrapped.getAnnotation( annotationType );
101    }   //  getAnnotation()
102
103    /**
104     *  {@inheritDoc}
105     */
106    @Override
107    public final <A extends Annotation> A [] getAnnotationsByType( final Class<A> annotationType )
108    {
109        return m_Wrapped.getAnnotationsByType( annotationType );
110    }   //  getAnnotationsByType()
111
112    /**
113     *  {@inheritDoc}
114     */
115    @Override
116    public final List<? extends AnnotationMirror> getAnnotationMirrors() { return m_Wrapped.getAnnotationMirrors(); }
117
118    /**
119     *  {@inheritDoc}
120     */
121    @Override
122    public final List<? extends Element> getEnclosedElements() { return m_Wrapped.getEnclosedElements(); }
123
124    /**
125     *  {@inheritDoc}
126     */
127    @Override
128    public Element getEnclosingElement() { return m_Wrapped.getEnclosingElement(); }
129
130    /**
131     *  {@inheritDoc}
132     */
133    @Override
134    public final ElementKind getKind() { return m_Wrapped.getKind(); }
135
136    /**
137     *  {@inheritDoc}
138     */
139    @Override
140    public final Set<Modifier> getModifiers() { return m_Wrapped.getModifiers(); }
141
142    /**
143     *  {@inheritDoc}
144     */
145    @Override
146    public final Name getSimpleName() { return m_Wrapped.getSimpleName(); }
147
148    /**
149     *  Tests whether the given element is part of an API or not. The
150     *  consideration is, that only element that are either {@code public} or
151     *  {@code protected} are part of the API of a class.
152     *
153     *  @param  element The element to test.
154     *  @return {@code true} if the element is part of the API, {@code false}
155     *      otherwise.
156     */
157    public static final boolean isAPI( final Element element )
158    {
159        final var modifiers = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getModifiers();
160        final var retValue = modifiers.contains( PUBLIC ) || modifiers.contains( PROTECTED );
161
162        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
163        return retValue;
164    }   //  isAPI()
165
166    /**
167     *  Tests whether the given element represents a field.
168     *
169     *  @param  element The element to test.
170     *  @return {@code true} if the element represents a field (but not an
171     *      enum value constant), {@code false} otherwise.
172     */
173    public static final boolean isAttribute( final Element element ) { return requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getKind() == FIELD; }
174
175    /**
176     *  Tests whether the given element represents a constructor.
177     *
178     *  @param  element The element to test.
179     *  @return {@code true} if the element represents a constructor,
180     *      {@code false} otherwise.
181     */
182    public static final boolean isConstructor( final Element element ) { return requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getKind() == CONSTRUCTOR; }
183
184    /**
185     *  Tests whether the given element represents a method.
186     *
187     *  @param  element The element to test.
188     *  @return {@code true} if the element represents a method,
189     *      {@code false} otherwise.
190     */
191    public static final boolean isMethod( final Element element ) { return requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getKind() == METHOD; }
192}
193//  class UMLElement
194
195/*
196 *  End of File
197 */
